name: Space Beetle Adventure
description:
The future of the galaxy is now in your hands. Prepare your beetle for a space attack in this arcade shooting game
- collect coins and make your space bug more and more powerful with drones and firepower
- two incredible different worlds in the campaign, each with its own challenges
- synthwave songs that bring back the 80s
Welcome to the most fun classic game. We promise to offer the best gaming experience in this version
